title: Suspect in Prince George’s County Bank Robberies Arrested in Texas
body:
Anyone with information about
this case is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Robbery
Unit at (301) 772-4905.  Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call
Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477) or text “PGPD plus your message” to
CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or go to  and submit a
tip online.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
